        <h1
          class="pf-c-modal-box__title"
          id="modal-md-title"
        >This is a long header title that will truncate because modal titles should be very short. Use the modal body to provide more info.</h1>
      </header>
      <div class="pf-c-modal-box__body">
        <p
          id="modal-md-description"
        >The "aria-describedby" attribute can be applied to any text that adequately describes the modal's purpose. It does not have to be assigned to ".pf-c-modal-box__body"</p>
        <p>Form here</p>
      </div>
      <footer class="pf-c-modal-box__footer">
        <button class="pf-c-button pf-m-primary" type="button">Save</button>
        <button class="pf-c-button pf-m-link" type="button">Cancel</button>
      </footer>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

```

          <div class="pf-c-form__group">
            <div class="pf-c-form__group-label"><label class="pf-c-form__label" for="-form-email">
                <span class="pf-c-form__label-text">E-mail</span>&nbsp;<span class="pf-c-form__label-required" aria-hidden="true">&#42;</span></label>&nbsp;<span
                class="pf-c-form__group-label-help"
                aria-label="More information for email field"
                aria-describedby="-form-email"
                role="button"
                type="button"
                tabindex="0"
              ><i class="pficon pf-icon-help" aria-hidden="true"></i></span>
            </div>
            <div class="pf-c-form__group-control">
              <input
                class="pf-c-form-control"
                type="text"
                id="-form-email"
                name="-form-email"
                required
              />
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="pf-c-form__group">
            <div class="pf-c-form__group-label"><label class="pf-c-form__label" for="-form-address">
                <span class="pf-c-form__label-text">Address</span>&nbsp;<span class="pf-c-form__label-required" aria-hidden="true">&#42;</span></label>&nbsp;<span
                class="pf-c-form__group-label-help"
                aria-label="More information for address field"
                aria-describedby="-form-address"
                role="button"
                type="button"
                tabindex="0"
              ><i class="pficon pf-icon-help" aria-hidden="true"></i></span>
            </div>
            <div class="pf-c-form__group-control">
              <input
                class="pf-c-form-control"
                type="text"
                id="-form-address"
                name="-form-address"
                required
              />
            </div>
          </div>
        </form>
      </div>
      <footer class="pf-c-modal-box__footer">
        <button
          class="pf-c-button pf-m-primary"
          type="button"
          form="-form"
        >Create</button>

      </footer>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

```
